name: Pain to Win
description:
Website: https://pedrogranja013.wixsite.com/paintowin2 
High Concept: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qHjx88ctkxoy5dZiJscIZnm8eIbQmV27/view
Initially it started as a game pitch produced for the theme lootboxes, becoming an idea the team found interesting to develop.

Consequently we created Pain to Win, a 2D rogue-like metroidvania, where the player is stimulated to climb his way through the city skyscrapers in order to uncover the truth behind a dystopian city. The journey will oblige risk taking, making the purchase of loot boxes with health points a necessity.

Made by: Gabriel Fernandes, Pedro Granja, Alexandre Chícharo
